name: DP Video 7" Widescreen Overhead Monitor with DVD Player and IR/FM Transmitters, DZ733D

reviews.name: DP Video 7" Widescreen Overhead Monitor with DVD Player and IR/FM Transmitters, DZ733D
reviews.reviewText: The audio comes in great on any of the radio stations you set it at. The only problem that we've experienced so far is the latch that keeps the lid closed for the dvd isn't very durable. One of our two y.o.'s forced it open and now it's hard sometimes to keep it closed, b/c the latch doesn't retract back sometimes to keep the lid closed. Maybe a more durable spring should have been used. We have it mounted in a mini-van and is easily seen from the middle and back row seats. For the older kids, it comes with a nice remote with lots of options. As far as mounting it yourself, you need to be pretty good with electronics. We had it professionally mounted for $150. For the money, it's not a bad overhead dvd player.
reviews.title: Excellent price for 7" monitor

reviews.name: DP Video 7" Widescreen Overhead Monitor with DVD Player and IR/FM Transmitters, DZ733D
reviews.reviewText: We bought 2 of these for a road trip to Florida. BOTH dvd players started malfunctioning before the first day was over. It was hit or miss for the rest of the trip. One died totally before we made it home. Horrible, terrible product, do not buy.
reviews.title: Terrible dvd

reviews.name: DP Video 7" Widescreen Overhead Monitor with DVD Player and IR/FM Transmitters, DZ733D
reviews.reviewText: I am very the good monitor for my car!!
reviews.title: Good Monitor

reviews.name: DP Video 7" Widescreen Overhead Monitor with DVD Player and IR/FM Transmitters, DZ733D
reviews.reviewText: Had a large cable harness coming out of the SIDE instead of the top. Very poor assembly- some screws had come completely loose in the box. Returned it and bought a 9" Clarion that was quite a bit lighter and much easier to install.
reviews.title: Not as Pictured
